name: Stardust Arena
description:
STARDUST ARENA is a fast paced, chaotic arcade shooter set in the distant future. An asteroid mining unit finds themself in an intergalactic battle arena, most likely against their will, where the only way out is to fight to the death for the entertainment of the local supercluster.

[ currently in pre-alpha ]

PLANS FOR THE FUTURE:

  • Upgrade your ship by collecting and combining modules, each providing unique benefits.
  • Constant action and challenge from waves of enemy encounters
  • 5 different arenas
  • Endless gameplay
  • Diverse enemy types with different playstyles and strategies to defeat
  • Lots of weapons that you can upgrade according to your needs, similarly to modules

Any amount of fun provided will be appreciated
